TunableList.name: SWIMMING_WALKSTYLES
TunableList.description: The exhaustive list of walkstyles allowed while Sims are swimming. If a Sim has a request for a walkstyle that is not supported, the first element is used as a replacement.

TunableList.name: TERRAIN_TAG_WALKSTYLES
TunableList.description: Associate a terrain tag to a specific walkstyle.

TunableTuple.description: The terrain tags and walkstyles that are associated.

TunableEnum.name: terrain_tag
TunableEnum.description: The terrain tag that applies the tuned walkstyle.

Tunable.name: walkstyle_to_use
Tunable.description: The walkstyle that should be used on the given terrain type.

TunableList.name: WALKSTYLE_COST
TunableList.description: Associate a specific walkstyle to a statistic cost before the walkstyle can be activated.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The walkstyle that should have a specified cost when triggered.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Cost data of the specified walkstyle.

Tunable.name: cost
Tunable.description: When the walkstyle is triggered during a route, this is the cost that will be substracted from the specified statistic.

Tunable.name: walkstyle_cost_statistic
Tunable.description: The statistic we are operating on when the walkstyle is triggered.

TunableList.name: WALKSTYLES_OVERRIDE_TELEPORT
TunableList.description: Any walkstyles found here will be able to override the teleport styles if they are specified.
